message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.HC 

This paper deals with the task of predicting untranslated terminology in simultaneous interpretation, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes the use of intelligent computer-assisted interpreting tools, which falls under the scope of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The use of supervised sequence taggers and task-specific features also suggests the relevance of cs.LG (Learning) and cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing). Finally, the paper discusses the potential impact of their proposed method on improving interpreter performance, which relates to cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction).
